name: Modern Minesweeper
description:
Play the classic Minesweeper in a more modern look and feel.

Instructions:

  • The goal of the game is to uncover all tiles that do not contain a bomb.
  • Left-click a tile to uncover it, right-click a tile to mark/unmark it.
  • Checking the numbers: a number tells you exactly how many bombs are adjacent to that tile - this counts the left, right, upper and lower neighbour of the tile, as well as all four on the diagonals.
  • You win if you manage to uncover all tiles, that do not contain a bomb.
  • You lose if you click on a tile that contains a bomb.

Additional features:

  • First clicked tile is never a bomb, neither are any of its neighbours.
  • Toggle between the light and the dark theme (your choice is remembered after you exit the application).
